distribution.text: Copyright 2023 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for ghostscript fixes the following issues:

- bsc#1006592: Fix a regression introduced in CVE-2013-5653 by which ps files couldn't be
  opened in okular/evince (kde#371887).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: The getenv and filenameforall functions in Ghostscript 9.10 ignore the "-dSAFER" argument, which allows remote attackers to read data via a crafted postscript file.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
